content:
COPY
MC-3995
June 8, 1962
To
: Dr. C. H. Yen, Commissioner, PHA.
From : Walter S. Shurkin, Industrial Hygiene Advisor Industrial Development Division
Subject : Surplus Vehicles (Engine No. MD-68955)
The US A. I.D. Mission to China has received from U.S. excess property two vehicles, which it is turning over for your use in the Hospital and Health Facilities and Administration project.
These vehicles are not new, and will need extensive repairs to make them serviceable. As US A.I.D. regulations prevent us from using funds for repairs, it will be necessary for the Chinese Government to provide the money needed to expedite the vehicle repairs.
國史饭 Academia Historica
234

paragraphs.content: : Dr. C. H. Yen, Commissioner, PHA.
From : Walter S. Shurkin, Industrial Hygiene Advisor Industrial Development Division
The US A. I.D. Mission to China has received from U.S. excess property two vehicles, which it is turning over for your use in the Hospital and Health Facilities and Administration project.

These vehicles are not new, and will need extensive repairs to make them serviceable. As US A.I.D. regulations prevent us from using funds for repairs, it will be necessary for the Chinese Government to provide the money needed to expedite the vehicle repairs.
